message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I know you'll find valuable.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the benefits it will bring me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for the best possible deal. While your offer is tempting, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $1,375,000.  This is a very competitive price considering the return you'll see on your investment.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $1,325,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the benefits it will bring me.
